title: Cinnamon and raisin French toast
ingredients: ['115g cream cheese, softened', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', "8 slices raisin loaf with cinnamon, such as Warburton's", '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons milk', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon butter or as needed']
